roleset.name: conveyance of something from one place to another
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on transport-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls send-11.1.

example.name: source and destination in one word = path= arg2
example.text: 56 - year - old Forry Drake has been charged with interstate transport of a minor .

example.name: another path, where source and destination are together
example.text: The " little three links " - direct mail , transport , and commerce between the ROC islands of Kinmen and Matsu on the one side and the PRC on the other - were formally opened on January 2 .
example.arg: between the ROC islands of Kinmen and Matsu on the one side and the PRC on the other

example.name: args 0, 1 and 3
example.text: Sedges have important effects on many ecosystem processes, including methane flux, because of their transport of oxygen to soils.
